hello.output:
Hello %{u}! You are using CodeDoBo version %{v} by %{d} (https://github.com/codedobo). Discord api version: %{r}! 
Use `modules` to see all modules!

modules.output:
You are using %{c} modules: %{m}! 
Use `module <Module>` for help

help.title: Quiz module help
help.description:
`quiz` 
Get the help of this module 
`quiz info` 
Get info about the configuration 
`quiz chat <Chat-ID>` 
Set the solution chat 
`quiz create` 
Create a new quiz.
